p: Yadav and Lathi [53] also observed an increase of initial activity for the enzymatic transesterification of methyl acetoacetate with various alcohols in the 2.2–4.6-fold range for microwave irradiated reaction over conventional reactions. In another study, the enzymatic synthesis of isoamyl myristate by esterification reaction in a solvent-free system catalyzed by Novozym 435 was also improved by microwave irradiation [54]. The productivity of xylitol monoesters synthesis catalyzed by immobilized lipase from Penicillium camemberti was higher under nonconventional heating than conventional one, 5.3 mmol/h and 2.2 mmol/h, respectively [29].
